price: 11. Išskyrus tuos, kurie rodo kantrybę ir daro gerus darbus – tie. Jų bus atleidimas ir didis atlygis (Rojus).
arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ صَبَرُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٞ وَأَجۡرٞ كَبِيرٞ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: illā alladhīna ṣabarū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti ulāika lahum maghfiratun wa-ajrun kabīrun
